text: my hero in history is margie de king
rosa parks harriet tubman this is real
when i think of martin luther king i
think of him helping me with my civil
rights he fought for my freedom he
sacrificed his own self to help us
harriet tubman inspires me because she
sacrificed her life to help her friends
family and people madam c.j walker is
the first black female millionaire when
i think of rosa parks i know i have to
stand up for what i believe in one day
they're going to celebrate me in black
history black history is our history
